<item>
<title><![CDATA[Barclays develops contactless payments app for Android mobile OS]]></title>

<item>

<item>

<item>

<item>

<item>

<item>
<title><![CDATA[Take part in our groundbreaking research into organisational change]]></title>
<link>http://www.computerweekly.com/news/450296109/Take-part-in-our-groundbreaking-research-into-organisational-change</link>
<description><![CDATA[Take part in our groundbreaking research to identify best practice in IT project management and organisational change. Participants receive a free, confidential, 11-page report that will provide insights into their chosen project, including a prediction of its likely success or failure
]]></description>
